name: Shuttle Run Intervals
step_by_step: Run down and back continuously for duration

name: Hill Sprint Intervals
step_by_step: Sprint uphill hard, walk back down for recovery

name: Hill Sprint + Broad Jump Combo
step_by_step: Sprint uphill, walk down, perform broad jumps up hill, walk down, repeat

name: Bike Mountain Climb VO2 Ladder
step_by_step: Each minute perform sprint at high resistance for 20,40,60,80,100,120,100,80,60,40,20 pedal pushes, recover remaining time

name: Bike Pyramid Power Intervals
step_by_step: Each minute sprint for 30,45,60,75,90,75,60,45,30 pedal pushes, recover remaining time

name: Bike Descending VO2 Sprints
step_by_step: Each minute sprint for 100,90,80,70,60,50,40,30 pedal pushes, recover remaining time
coaching_cues: Stay powerful even as volume drops

name: Curved Treadmill 1 Minute Sprint Interval
step_by_step: 5 hard sprints using prescribed work/rest options
coaching_cues: Increase sprint time gradually, cap at 30/30

name: Flat Acceleration Sprint Block
step_by_step: Sprint 10–20 yd at max effort, full stop, walk back and fully recover before next rep
coaching_cues: Explode first 3 steps, full rest between reps

name: Lateral Shuffle Sprint Repeats
step_by_step: Shuffle laterally hard for 10–15 yd, touch line, return, rest briefly, repeat
coaching_cues: Stay low, push through inside edge, quick change of direction

name: Multi-Direction Shift Simulation
step_by_step: Perform continuous multi-direction sprinting (forward, lateral, hard stops) for 30–40 sec, rest fully before next round
coaching_cues: Max intent for duration, controlled breathing in recovery

name: Zone 2 Aerobic Base Run
step_by_step: Run at steady conversational pace for 15–25 minutes
coaching_cues: Maintain nasal breathing if possible, steady rhythm
